items.name: Paloma
items.description: A refreshing Mexican cocktail made with tequila, grapefruit juice, and lime, served over ice.

items.name: Espresso Martini
items.description: Made with vodka, coffee liqueur, and a hint of simple syrup, shaken with ice and strained into a chilled martini glass.

items.name: Spicy Pineapple Martini
items.description: Vodka infused with spice, combined with pineapple juice and a hint of lime juice, served in a chilled martini glass.

items.name: Cosmopolitan
items.description: A popular cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and a splash of fresh lime juice

items.name: Classic Martini
items.description: Made with gin and dry vermouth, served in a chilled martini glass

items.name: Manhattan
items.description: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and a dash of aromatic bitters

items.name: Old Fashioned
items.description: A simple cocktail consisting of whiskey, sugar, bitters, and ice, garnished with an orange twist and served in a rocks glass

items.name: Blackberry Lemonade
items.description: A refreshing blend of Blackberry Crown whiskey and freshly squeezed lemonade
